SELECT APP.ID AS approvalId, APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE AS apprTypeCode, TYPE_CODE.NAME AS apprTypeName,
REQ_EMP.ID AS requesterId, REQ_EMP.NAME AS requesterName,
-- 수발주 품목: 품목명 또는 "xxx외 N건" NVL( CASE WHEN APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = 'SLS001' THEN ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN MIN(I.NAME) ELSE MIN(I.NAME) || '외 ' || (COUNT(*) - 1) || '건' END FROM CONTRACT C JOIN CONTRACT_LIST CL ON C.ID = CL.CONTRACT_ID JOIN ITEM I ON CL.ITEM_ID = I.ID WHERE C.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID ) WHEN APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = 'SLS002' THEN ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN MIN(M.NAME) ELSE MIN(M.NAME) || '외 ' || (COUNT(*) - 1) || '건' END FROM PURCHASE P JOIN PURCHASE_LIST PL ON P.ID = PL.PURCHASE_ID JOIN MATERIAL M ON PL.MATERIAL_ID = M.ID WHERE P.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID ) END, '-' ) AS itemSummary,
-- 거래처명 (수주/발주) NVL( CASE WHEN APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = 'SLS001' THEN (SELECT CLT.NAME FROM CONTRACT C JOIN CLIENT CLT ON C.CLIENT_ID = CLT.ID WHERE C.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID) WHEN APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = 'SLS002' THEN (SELECT CLT.NAME FROM PURCHASE P JOIN CLIENT CLT ON P.CLIENT_ID = CLT.ID WHERE P.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID) END, '-' ) AS clientName,
APP.REQUESTED_AT AS requestedAt, APP.CONFIRMED_AT AS confirmedAt,
APRV_EMP.NAME AS approverName, APP.APPROVER_ID AS approverId,
APP.APPROVAL_STATUS_CODE AS approvalStatusCode, STATUS_CODE.NAME AS approvalStatusName,
APP.REJECT_REASON AS rejectionReason
FROM APPROVAL APP LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE REQ_EMP ON REQ_EMP.ID = APP.REQUESTER_ID LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE APRV_EMP ON APRV_EMP.ID = APP.APPROVER_ID LEFT JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE TYPE_CODE ON APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = TYPE_CODE.DETAIL_CODE LEFT JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE STATUS_CODE ON APP.APPROVAL_STATUS_CODE = STATUS_CODE.DETAIL_CODE
AND APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE IN ('SLS001', 'SLS002')
AND APP.REQUESTED_AT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND APP.REQUESTED_AT <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = #{apprType}
AND ( -- 신청자 이름 REQ_EMP.NAME LIKE '%' || #{approvalNameOrEmpId} || '%'
-- 신청자 사번 (숫자일 경우) OR ( REGEXP_LIKE(#{approvalNameOrEmpId}, '^[0-9]+') AND TO_CHAR(REQ_EMP.ID) LIKE '%' || #{approvalNameOrEmpId} || '%' )
-- 거래처명 (수주/발주 모두) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CONTRACT C JOIN CLIENT CLT ON C.CLIENT_ID = CLT.ID WHERE C.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID AND C.APPROVAL_ID IS NOT NULL AND CLT.NAME LIKE '%' || #{approvalNameOrEmpId} || '%' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PURCHASE P JOIN CLIENT CLT ON P.CLIENT_ID = CLT.ID WHERE P.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID AND P.APPROVAL_ID IS NOT NULL AND CLT.NAME LIKE '%' || #{approvalNameOrEmpId} || '%' ) )
ORDER BY APP.ID DESC

SELECT APP.ID AS approvalId, APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE AS apprTypeCode, TYPE_CODE.NAME AS apprTypeName,
REQ_EMP.ID AS requesterId, REQ_EMP.NAME AS requesterName,
-- 수발주 품목: 품목명 또는 "xxx외 N건" NVL( CASE WHEN APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = 'SLS001' THEN ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN MIN(I.NAME) ELSE MIN(I.NAME) || '외 ' || (COUNT(*) - 1) || '건' END FROM CONTRACT C JOIN CONTRACT_LIST CL ON C.ID = CL.CONTRACT_ID JOIN ITEM I ON CL.ITEM_ID = I.ID WHERE C.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID ) WHEN APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = 'SLS002' THEN ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN MIN(M.NAME) ELSE MIN(M.NAME) || '외 ' || (COUNT(*) - 1) || '건' END FROM PURCHASE P JOIN PURCHASE_LIST PL ON P.ID = PL.PURCHASE_ID JOIN MATERIAL M ON PL.MATERIAL_ID = M.ID WHERE P.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID ) END, '-' ) AS itemSummary,
-- 거래처명 (수주/발주) NVL( CASE WHEN APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = 'SLS001' THEN (SELECT CLT.NAME FROM CONTRACT C JOIN CLIENT CLT ON C.CLIENT_ID = CLT.ID WHERE C.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID) WHEN APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = 'SLS002' THEN (SELECT CLT.NAME FROM PURCHASE P JOIN CLIENT CLT ON P.CLIENT_ID = CLT.ID WHERE P.APPROVAL_ID = APP.ID) END, '-' ) AS clientName,
APP.REQUESTED_AT AS requestedAt, APP.CONFIRMED_AT AS confirmedAt,
APRV_EMP.NAME AS approverName, APP.APPROVER_ID AS approverId,
APP.APPROVAL_STATUS_CODE AS approvalStatusCode, STATUS_CODE.NAME AS approvalStatusName,
APP.REJECT_REASON AS rejectionReason
FROM APPROVAL APP LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE REQ_EMP ON REQ_EMP.ID = APP.REQUESTER_ID LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE APRV_EMP ON APRV_EMP.ID = APP.APPROVER_ID LEFT JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE TYPE_CODE ON APP.APPROVAL_TYPE_CODE = TYPE_CODE.DETAIL_CODE LEFT JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE STATUS_CODE ON APP.APPROVAL_STATUS_CODE = STATUS_CODE.DETAIL_CODE
WHERE APP.ID = #{approvalId}
